description: Behaviors for creating particle effects and visual effects systems

wpe_area.name: WPE Area
wpe_area.description: Displays particle effects at and around the object's area. Can be activated by a linked switch or zone, or set to active automatically. Supports looped sound effects and configurable vertical offset.

properties.name: WPEFILE
properties.description: Path to the particle effect file (.pe format)

properties.name: IsActive
properties.description: Whether the particle effect starts active automatically

properties.name: OffsetY
properties.description: Vertical offset controlling how far above the object the effect is displayed

wpe_blast.name: WPE Blast
wpe_blast.description: Creates explosive particle effects that trigger at random intervals near the player. Can be activated by a linked switch or zone, or set to active automatically. Includes explosion sound effects and can damage the player if they're too close to the blast.

properties.name: WPEFILE
properties.description: Path to the particle effect file (.pe format)

properties.name: IsActive
properties.description: Whether the blast effect starts active automatically. If unticked, must be activated by switch or zone.

features: Player damage when close to blast

wpe_impact.name: WPE Impact
wpe_impact.description: Creates impact particle effects that trigger at random intervals near the player. Can be activated by a linked switch or zone, or set to active automatically. Includes impact/explosion sound effects and can damage the player if they're too close to the impact.

properties.name: WPEFILE
properties.description: Path to the particle effect file (.pe format)

properties.name: IsActive
properties.description: Whether the impact effect starts active automatically. If unticked, must be activated by switch or zone.

features: Player damage when close to impact

wpe_rain.name: WPE Rain
wpe_rain.description: Creates a rain particle effect with automatic indoor/outdoor detection. Can be activated by a linked switch or zone, or set to active automatically. Includes looped rain sound effects and sets a global variable for external behaviors to detect when rain is active.

properties.name: WPEFILE
properties.description: Path to the particle effect file (.pe format)

properties.name: IsActive
properties.description: Whether the rain effect starts active automatically. If unticked, must be activated by switch or zone.

features: Particle visibility control based on player location
Gradually increasing sound volume on activation
Global variable (g_raining) for external behavior detection

wpe_zone.name: WPE Zone
wpe_zone.description: Displays particle effects while the player is within the zone area. Features automatic indoor/outdoor detection and configurable height-based zone detection. Includes looped sound effects and options to disable particles when player exits or goes indoors.

properties.name: WPEFILE
properties.description: Path to the particle effect file (.pe format)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Maximum height above the zone that the player can be for the zone to trigger

properties.name: DisableOutside
properties.description: Whether to stop particles when player exits the zone

properties.name: DisableIndoors
properties.description: Whether to stop particles when player is indoors

features: Gradually increasing sound volume on activation
Configurable disable options for outside and indoors
Sound stopping when player exits zone
